name: X-ray hospital
description:
Recently, Janet had to go to hospital for a spinal injection. Where she is examined by the beautiful and sexy Dr. Julia.
Will the doctor tempt her patient? Or will Jenet remain true to her partner?

This is a short story about the sexual and vivid thoughts of the main character during the passage of treatment in the hospital. Throughout the story, she will start conversations with different characters at different locations.Features
  • Visual novel game with sexy content;
  • Drastic story;
  • Surprising ending;
  • Steam achievements.
